properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Raha nanjenjena foan
Mila toky izany fo,
Fa ny ora manoloana,
No manjombona tokoa :

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Indro ! Jeso (indro ! Jeso)
Mitomany, (mitomany)
Fa ny fony tia anao ;
Eo anilanao hatrany
Tsy miala na mandao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Raha misento sy misaona,
Fa mamely ny manjo :
Hasambarana mivaona,
Hafaliana zary lo.
Indro ! Jeso, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fa ny alom-pijaliana
Fanafody mahasoa ;
Ka omena zaza tiana,
Mba hitombo sy hamoa.
Indro ! Jeso, sns.
